description: This file initializes a knowledge base using Markdown files and a vector database, then creates an agent to interact with the knowledge base asynchronously, including a test run in the main block.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: MarkdownKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads and manages markdown documents.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface for PostgreSQL using pgvector.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response based on the knowledge base.
